---
title: "Bivariate Choropleth: Protestantism and Catholocism in the US"
date: "2021-11-26"
categories: [QGIS, 30DayMapChallenge2021]
---

Protestantism and Catholicism in the (contiguous) USA (sorry Alaska + Hawaii), mapped in QGIS as a bivariate choropleth map.

![](images/Protestantism-Catholicism.png)

The nice legend was made with the [bivariate legend plugin for QGIS](https://plugins.qgis.org/plugins/BivariateLegend/).

Data at county level from the [2010 U.S. Religion Census Religious Congregations and Membership Study](https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/QUN29).
